mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_CONFIG( id, admin_username, admin_password, mail_server_name, mail_server_port, mail_user_email, mail_user_password, mail_ssl_enabled, to_mails, task_file_path, log_path, db_path, control_server, user_type, company_name, company_address, applicant, applyPhone1, applyPhone2, apply_mail, minite_error_limit, running_limit ) VALUES( #{id}, #{adminUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mailServerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mailSmtpPort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mailEmailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mailEmailPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mailSslCheckbox}, #{toMails,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskFilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{controlServer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyPhone1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyPhone2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{miniteErrorLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{runningLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
